about_the_game:
Zombreak is a zombie survival, rogue-lite, top-down shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies.

Zombie Roguelite:

The game offers a challenging zombie roguelite experience. In this game, you play as a survivor trying to fight your way out of the zombie horde and find safety in a world gone mad.

Tactical Gunplay:

Zombies aren't the only threat in this world. Hostile survivors roam the wasteland, ready to take what they need by force. You'll need to decide whether to fight them off for rewarding loot or avoid them for your own survival.

Customize Loadout:

As your last hope for survival, you must navigate through a dangerous world, filled with hordes of bloodthirsty zombies, deadly traps, and valuable resources to scavenge. Customize and select the right loadout for the task ahead. You'll need to strategize and plan your escape carefully, as the zombies will stop at nothing to catch you.

Upgrade Hideout:

As you progress through the game, you'll unlock new weapons and upgrades to help you survive against increasingly difficult challenges. You'll encounter a variety of survivors, each with their own unique story and abilities, who can aid you in your escape.


Can you make it through the zombie horde and escape the post-apocalyptic wasteland?

Game Features:

  • Challenging rogue-lite gameplay
  • A variety of weapons and upgrades to unlock and utilize
  • Encounter a variety of survivors with their own stories and abilities
  • Fight off hostile survivors for resources
  • Test your skills against increasingly difficult challenges and hordes of zombies.

name: Zombreak: The Last Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580 / GTX 1060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Zombreak is a zombie survival, rogue-lite, top-down shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. As a last hope of survival, you must navigate through a dangerous world, filled with hordes of bloodthirsty zombies, deadly traps, and resources to scavenge. You'll need to strategize and plan your escape.
